item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: Project 1: Exploratory Data Analysis
item.description: Data Wrangling and Data Exploration Introduction These datasets were taken from the Association of American Medical Colleges (AAMC) website, and contain data from medical schools in 2019. "appsandmats" is a dataset that contains information about U.S. medical school applications and matriculants by school, state of legal residence, and sex, 2019-2020. "raceeth" contains information about the total enrollment by U.S. medical school and race/ethnicity for the 2019-2020 year. These are interesting to me because I am in the process of interviewing for medical schools in Texas only, and it is cool to see data from schools that I have interviewed for but also around the US.

item.title: Project 2
item.description: Modeling, Testing, and Predicting Introduction I am going to be using the aSAH dataset, which summarizes several clinical and one laboratory variable of 113 patients with an aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage The variables are defined as: NDKA:Nucleoside diphosphate kinase A wfn: World Federation of Neurological Surgeons, uses the Glasgow Coma Scale and presence of focal neurological deficits to grade the clinical severity of subarachnoid hemorrhage. grade 1: GCS 15, no motor deficit.
